response: Welcome to our module on the ease of scooter ownership. We offer features for customer convenience like home service and seamless home charging with a portable charger. Our expanding network of hyperchargers provides fast, free charging on the go. Service is simple with app booking, at-home service, predictive AI maintenance, and 24/7 roadside assistance. Plus, save on fuel costs with our efficient Ola S1 scooter. These features make owning and maintaining your scooter easier and more cost-effective. Thank you.
title: L1.1.4 Ownership made easy.mp4
